about.description:
analytics-python is a python client for [Segment](https://segment.com)

You can't fix what you can't measure

Analytics helps you measure your users, product, and business. It unlocks insights into your app's funnel, core business metrics, and whether you have a product-market fit. PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/analytics-python](https://pypi.org/project/analytics-python)
about.summary: The hassle-free way to integrate analytics into any python application.

name: analytics-python
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "analytics-python" %} {% set pypi_name = "segment-analytics-python" %} {% set version = "2.3.3" %} package: name: {{ name|lower }} version: {{ version }} source: url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ pypi_name[0] }}/{{ pypi_name }}/{{ pypi_name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz sha256: ce6b3b4387ec9ebc5b55842c44d7dd63b4d4b0b8188e268c4492f909e5eeeed8 build: noarch: python number: 1 script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv requirements: host: - pip - python {{ python_min }} - setuptools run: - python >={{ python_min }} - backoff ~=2.1 - python-dateutil ~=2.2 - requests ~=2.7 - pyjwt ~=2.8.0 test: imports: - segment commands: - pip check requires: - pip - python {{ python_min }} about: home: https://github.com/segmentio/analytics-python summary: The hassle-free way to integrate analytics into any python application. license: MIT license_file: LICENSE description: | analytics-python is a python client for [Segment](https://segment.com)

You can't fix what you can't measure

Analytics helps you measure your users, product, and business. It unlocks insights into your app's funnel, core business metrics, and whether you have a product-market fit. PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/analytics-python](https://pypi.org/project/analytics-python) doc_url: https://segment.com/libraries/python dev_url: https://github.com/segmentio/analytics-python extra: recipe-maintainers: - BrentDorsey - sugatoray - thewchan
